Title: Try Again, Taivan!
Description:
Return to the Teerai and tell them that not even I can train Taivan to be a hunter. He simply does not have it in him.

He is the most un-ferocious bakar I have ever seen, and I bet he would even try to make friends with the wild game if we let him! Hah!
ObjectivesText: Return to Healer Selbekh in Maruukai and deliver the bad news.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Healer Selbekh in Maruukai
RewardText:
Taivan just returned. They could not have trained him so quickly could they? No... I suppose not.

<She sighs deeply and looks at Taivan.>

He doesn't seem to be taking it well, either. I have one more idea, and if this doesn't work, we will have to make some difficult decisions.
